results.title: Metformin Attenuates Inflammation and Fibrosis in Thyroid-Associated Ophthalmopathy
results.text_hl: As @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has multiple therapeutic effects in many @DISEASE_Autoimmune_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001327 @@@autoimmune diseases@@@, we explored the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Graves_Ophthalmopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D049970 @@@TAO@@@ in an in vitro fibroblast model.

citations.NLM: Xu Z, Ye H, Xiao W, Sun A, Yang S, Zhang T, Sha X, Yang H. Metformin Attenuates Inflammation and Fibrosis in Thyroid-Associated Ophthalmopathy Int J Mol Sci. 2022 Dec 7;23(24):. PMID: 36555150

results.title: Biguanides Metformin and Phenformin Generate Therapeutic Effects via AMP-Activated Protein Kinase/Extracellular-Regulated Kinase Pathways in an In Vitro Model of Graves' Orbitopathy.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Biguanides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001645 @@@Biguanides@@@ @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Phenformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010629 @@@Phenformin@@@ Generate Therapeutic Effects via AMP-Activated Protein Kinase/Extracellular-Regulated Kinase Pathways in an In Vitro Model of @<m>DISEASE_Graves_Ophthalmopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D049970 @@@Graves' Orbitopathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Han YE, Hwang S, Kim JH, Byun JW, Yoon JS, Lee EJ. Biguanides Metformin and Phenformin Generate Therapeutic Effects via AMP-Activated Protein Kinase/Extracellular-Regulated Kinase Pathways in an In Vitro Model of Graves' Orbitopathy. Thyroid. 2018 Apr;28(4):528-536. PMID: 29589999
